title: Completing code to display multiples of 5

content.question: Which of the following could replace in line 2 so that the code segment works as intended?

choices.label: Open parenthesis, open parenthesis, end minus start, close parenthesis, divided by 5, close parenthesis, plus 1
5, times, open parenthesis, end minus start, close parenthesis, plus 1

content.answer: Open parenthesis, open parenthesis, end minus start, close parenthesis, divided by 5, close parenthesis, plus 1

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Implement and apply an algorithm.
